mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT FORMAT((@counts := @counts + 1),0) AS numbers , us.age , us.phone , td.pcId , td.pcNm , us.cafe_nick FROM test_data AS td JOIN t_user us ON us.user_nm = td.user_nm , (SELECT @counts := 0) AS counts
UNION ALL
SELECT FORMAT((@counts := @counts + 1),0) AS numbers , '00'age , '010-9999-9999'phone , td.pcId , td.pcNm , '무큐'cafe_nick FROM test_data td , (SELECT @counts := 0) AS counts WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT NULL FROM t_user us WHERE td.user_nm = us.user_nm)) AS ko
ko.pcNm = #{mapNm}
